entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ralston 06:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
